import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-branded', templateUrl: './branded.component.html', styleUrls: ['./branded.component.css'] }) export class BrandedComponent { constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} list: any[]=[] ngOnInit(): void { const response = this.http.post("http://localhost:3000/medicine/list", { observe: 'response' }); response.subscribe(response=>{ const body=response.body console.log('response',response.data) this.list=Array.isArray(response.data) ? response.data : [response.data] }); } }
